EmailTemplate.name: 21_MyAero-Portal-Updates_Year-Program_Email_Operational.March Non-RTN Portal Use
EmailTemplate.subject: MyAerospace Portal Update – Microelectronics & Precision Sensors B2B
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Starting today March 8, 2021 our Microelectronics & Precision Sensors B2B eCommerce website will be moved to aerospace.honeywell.com and can be accessed through this LINK <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/purchase/orders/precision-sensors-ordering]]>. What features will be available?
- Online Ordering – Magnetic Sensors and Transducers can be placed using our Online Ordering tool for Commercial orders only. - Paper PO Form – Microelectronics, Precision Pressure Transducers, Barometers and High Temperature Electronics, as well as any Government orders, please submit your PO using the Paper PO form. - Order Status – For order status, check using our online order status tool. - RMA Request Form – To request an RMA, please complete the RMA request form. Do not send any hardware back to Honeywell without an RMA.
What parts can be placed using Online Ordering?
- Magnetic Sensors and Transducers can be placed using our Online Ordering tool for Commercial orders only.
For more information about this change, please visit our FAQ page on this HERE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/training/topics/microelectronics-precision-sensors-ordering-faq]]>. To view the individual release notes for the items listed above and to catch up on latest improvements to MyAerospace, please refer to and bookmark our Release Notes page: RELEASE NOTES <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace/release-notes]]> For training topics pages related to the portal, please refer to and bookmark this page: TRAINING TOPICS <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/training/topics]]> Please be sure to Opt-In to receive important portal enhancement update emails. OPT-IN <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/forms/subscription-page]]>
